profile_picture_desc: Show your audience who you are. If you're an individual business, we suggest adding a photo of you instead of a logo. A profile picture is a requirement to be active in the marketplace.
profile_about_you_desc: Write a text about yourself with a minimum of 150 characters to be visible in the marketplace. We recommend that you write about who you are, what you can offer, skills, or relevant academic background. Be aware, that it's not allowed to link websites, companies, or anything that encourage users to book outside the platform.
profile_mobile_description: This number will be used for communication purposed between you and your customers. It will also be used to notify you on changes in your bookings or other time critical information.
profile_language_description: What languages do you speak comfortably? You can add multiple languages
profile_birthday_description: Used to statistics and validate your membership.
profile_sport_tag_description: Add a minimum of three skills to be visible in the marketplace. Skills are used for specific qualities within a sport (attack, defense, etc.) If you have something specific you can offer your customers then use the tags to show this.
profile_social_profile_description: Where can we find you on social media? Social media is used to validate you as a user on the platform.
personalized_url_description: Create a custom URL for your Coachsome page to share across your social and digital channels.
package_rate_desc: What you would like your hourly price to be? Your price can always be changed and will be used to design your packages and showed in the marketplace. Be aware of Coachsome service fee (15%).
package_list_heading: Preview of your packages or services
default_package_title_desc: Create a catchy title for your package
default_package_desc_content: Here you can describe what the athlete gets out of buying you package and what’s included. You can chose what offerings that you will present to your athlets
default_package_session_desc: How many sessions are included in the package?
default_package_discount_desc: If you would give a discount for the package
default_package_price_desc: What you would like to charge for the package. Remember Coachsome service fee will be deducted from the transaction.
camp_package_attendee_desc: How many people can minimum and maximum attend the group package?
camp_completed_by_desc: How long ahead should the camp be booked at minimum capacity before execution
camp_package_price_desc: What you would like to charge per attendee
image_and_video_img_desc: Select and upload your images to your profile. Click the field to select a picture. Then click "Add"
image_and_video_vidoe_desc: Paste a Vimeo or Youtube link into the field to add it to your gallery. Then click "Add"
image_and_video_gallery_desc: Here you can view the videos and images that will be shown on your profile page
geography_section_location_desc: Add the locations where you will coach from. You can see the locations that you have entered below.
geography_section_distance_desc: How far are you willing to travel to coach? Enter the distance into the box and type the location from which the distance should be measured below. Be aware that your travel expenses will be included in the packages you offer on the platform as a launch offer.
availability_section_desc: Select the times where you are normally available on a weekly basis. You can always change your availability again.
availability_section_schedule_time_desc: Here you can see your coming weeks and remove times that you are not available or would like to add more times. Time shown are from start to end time. Press edit to get at more detailed view of the week
review_section_desc_fa_review:
If you have Facebook reviews, you can add them here.
Reviews are very important on the Coachsome platform, as you have an unique opportunity to build trust with your customers. Through our smart feature, you can transfer your Facebook reviews.
With reviews on your profile you are prioritized in our search results. In order to load your Facebook reviews and recommendations, you must click yes to 'manage your pages' and 'view a list of the pages you manage'. Coachsome only receives access to read your page's posts, reviews & comments. We cannot change or add content on your site.
review_helper_text_fa_btn: After you have connected your account and picked you facebook page, then please press update
verification_section_mobile_no_desc: Verify your account with your phone number
verification_section_info_mobile_no: Your phone number has been verified
verification_section_fb_desc: Verify your account with your facebook account
verification_section_fb_info: Your account is connected to Facebook
verification_sec_email_desc: Verify your account with your e-mail
verification_sec_email_info: Your e-mail address has been verified
invite_friend_modal_heading_desc: Select all the friends who you would like to join Coachsome
setting_sec_contact_info_user_desc: Your real name, this will not be used on the site and is only for invoicing purposes.
setting_sec_contact_info_loc_desc: Address information will not be shown on your profile and is only used for invoicing purposes. Your will be auto filled in your profile name - this can be changed.
setting_sec_email_desc: Enter the email you want to log in and receive notifications with
setting_sec_password_desc: Change your current password. If you forgot your current password, then use the forgot password from the log in page to reset your current password
setting_sec_timezone_desc: What time zone do you operate in?
setting_sec_notification_desc: How would you like get notified from Coachsome
setting_label_notification_when_message_: Recieve email notifications when someone message you
setting_label_notification_when_make_req: Receive email notifications when someone makes a request, booking, or gives a review
setting_label_when_make_booking: Recieve SMS notifications when someone make a booking or decline a request
setting_sec_invoice_identity_desc: This is the identity that will recieve the money
setting_sec_currency_desc: What currency do you work with
setting_sec_acc_payout_desc: Enter your account information so we can pay you for your services
setting_sec_card_on_file_desc: Here are the payment cards that we have registered to your account. We will not store your full card information, so you are safe.
setting_sec_plan_desc_top: This is your current plan on Coachsome. You can also change your plan by selecting a new one
setting_sec_plan_desc_bottom: We are working on new features that will create a better user experience for you. If you have an idea for a feature or something that will make your experience better, feel free to send us an e-mail on: info@coachsome.com
setting_sec_deactivation_desc: If you chose to delete your account, then you will not be visible on Coachsome. We will be sad to see you leave and hope that you’ll come back to us soon
text_another_acc: or use your social media account
reg_label_terms_conditions: When you sign up you agree to Coachsome’s Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
reg_text_create_another_acc: or create with your social account
package_label_special_price: Special price - not dependadnt on hourly rate
forgot_password_desc: Enter your email address and you will receive an email with a link to change your password.
forgot_password_info: Please check your spam folder or resend the email
profile_category_description: These are the sports and areas that you focus on and are used in searches to match customer and coach better.
about_text_our_mission_description: Our mission is to make coaches accessible for every athlete around the world.
about_text_description_what_we_do: Coachsome is a platform that create the contact between coaches and athletes. We make it extremely easy for coaches to start their coaching business so they can help athletes reach the next level. Through our marketplace of coaches, we make it easy for athletes to find and book their personal coaches.
about_text_description_how_it_started: After a summer when founder Peter had been offering personal basketball training, he discovered the huge demand for personal training and the difficulties of creating such a business. Together with his cousin and co-founder Alexander the two discussed the idea of creating a marketplace for personal coaches that would make it possible for coaches to create a business in a matter of minutes. The only problem now was, how could they get the idea into reality? Peter spend the summer of 2019 pitching the project for possible partners and ended up getting in contact with Kasper & Martin. The two investing founders could help design and develop the platform for the two cousins and the company was founded by Peter, Alexander, Martin, & Kasper in November, 2019.
valid_first_name_only_letter: First name should be only letter.
valid_at_least_one_upper_case_letter: Password should have at least one upper case letter.
valid_pass_min_character: Password should have  at least 6 characters.
valid_agree_terms_condition: Accept our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy to continue
email_verification_content:
Welcome to Coachsome!
Dear :fullName,
Please confirm that your email address is correct to continue. Click the button below to get started.

Activate
By successful activation, you are ready to get started with Coachsome! We recommend you first add your basic information.

Should you have any questions then find help here or feel free to contact us. We are open to any and all feedback and recommendations for improvements.

The best greetings from Coachsome team.
how_it_work_heading_desc: It’s never been easier to find a coach located near you!
how_it_work_sec_explore_coach_desc: Go on an adventure in our marketplace and find coaches based on your location, sport, or needs.
how_it_work_sec_book_and_pay_desc: Send a booking request and arrange time and location with your new coach. All transactions are securely processed online through our platform.
how_it_work_sec_meet_up_desc: When you have made your booking you will meet up at the arranged time and location to go through your practice.
how_it_work_sec_rating_desc: After your ended session you can rate your coach by telling other Coachsome-users about your experience.
how_it_work_faq_answer_one: It’s free to sign-up and offer services on Coachsome. We take a small fee when a transaction is made. This helps us operate our platform and offer customer support.
how_it_work_faq_answer_two: Coachsome is a software as a service platform that connect sports trainers and athletes.
how_it_work_faq_answer_three: Payments are handled securely online through the platform. Coachsome can handle Mobilepay, Apple Pay, PayPal and credit card.
how_it_work_faq_question_four: Do i need to have a company in order to create a coaching account?
how_it_work_faq_answer_four: No, you can create an account and offer a service on our platform no matter if you have a company or not.
after_register_text_message: You're almost there! We have sent an activation link to the email you provided. If you have not received an email, please check your spam inbox.
package_dialog_hourly_rate_desc: Set your hourly rate and we guide you through your packages based on your price. You can always change the price. Be aware that Coachsome takes a service fee of 15% on every transaction.
profile_save_success_message: Your profile has been successfully updated.
marketplace_infiniity_loader_no_result: Your search didn't give any results.
package_validation_price_for_full_packag: Price for full package is required
header_title_tag_front_home: Coachsome - Find private sports coaching online
front_sec_title_find_the_right_coach: Private sports coaching and mentoring for all ages, genders and levels
front_sec_how_it_work_header_desc: Coachsome is a platform that connects personal sports coaches and athletes. We make it fast, simple and secure to book a coach that can help you increase your potential.
front_sec_how_it_work_card_desc_explore_: Search after coaches in the marketplace and find the right coach based on your sport, location or specific skills.
front_sec_how_it_work_card_desc_make_you: We have made booking fast, secure and easy for you. Book your coach and get ready for your first session.
front_sec_how_it_work_card_desc_meet_up: Meet up at the arranged time and place with your coach and start taking the first step towards getting better.
front_sec_become_a_coach_card_desc_tool_: Bookingsystem, chatsystem, payment handling and coaching exposure.
front_sec_become_a_coach_card_desc_help_: You bring the skills and knowledge to help athletes succeed. We’ll make earning easy for you while doing it.
front_sec_become_a_coach_card_title_guid: We are here to guide you
front_sec_become_a_coach_card_desc_guide: Coachsome are here for you all the way, anything from answering any questions to resolving any issues, at any time.
front_banner_big_text: Find the right coach now! We have made it easy for you.
profile_name_desc: We recommend using you own or company name to establish confidence.
attention_content_list:
You do not meet the requirements for being active in the marketplace. The requirements for being active in the marketplace are:
Profile
  • Profile picture
  • Profile name
  • An “About” text with a minimum of 150 characters
  • Phone number
  • Minimum one language
  • Minimum one category
  • Minimum three skills
Packages
  • An hourly rate
  • At least one active package
Geography
  • At least one location
facebook_error_cancel_message: Continue with Facebook cancelled, please choose another login method.
google_error_cancel_message: Continue with Google cancelled, please choose another login method.
provider_error_message_without_email: Sorry, your social account did not register with email. Please select another social account.
front_slogan_text: Take your sports skills to the next level...
pending_booking_description: Thank you so much for your interrest in our platform. We are currently developing the platform and it's therefore not possible to make a booking at the moment but it will be soon. Enter you mail address in the field below, and we will get back to you as soon as the platform is ready for bookings.
pending_booking_label_special_text: Optional: Anything special you want from this coach?
pending_booking_request_mail_content:
Hello
:fullName

Please confirm your e-mail address to continue. Click the button below to confirm:

Confirm


After confirming your e-mail you are ready to receive updates from Coachsome. If you have any questions or feedback for our team, don’t ever hesitate to contact us. We are here to help you and aim to answer e-mails as fast as possible.

Yours, coachsome Team
info@coachsome.com
pending_booking_request_mail_subject: Thank you for signing up to Coachsome!
pending_booking_request_sucess_confirmat: Thank you so much for joining the Coachsome community. While we are still developing the platform we would love to receive an email from you with your specific requests from the Coachsome platform. Everything from what coach you are looking for to what we can do better to make your experience the best. Send an e-mail to info@coachsome.com or keep exploring our site in the meantime. We will get back to you as soon as we have the platform ready for bookings. Thank you for being patient!
pending_booking_req_email_sending_succes: Thank you for contacting us. Your message has been successfully sent. Please check your email, and if failed, please mail to info@coachsome.com
package_quick_booking_btn_label: Allow users to buy packages without your accept
package_quick_booking_btn_tooltip: By turning on it will allow an athlete to buy a package without waiting for the acceptance of the coach. By turning off you will have to accept the request of the package before the purchase can be completed. In this case, we will hold the money until you accept the package.
profile_athlete_profile_pic_desc: Please select a picture that clearly shows your face to make it easier for the people you will communicate with.
profile_athlete_profile_name_desc: We recommend using your own or club name to establish confidence.
profile_athlete_about_you_desc: We recommend a unique text that contains at least 9 lines, and please do not divulge personal information like phone number, email, or hometown.
profile_athlete_mobile_description: Your phone number will be used to notify you of changes in your bookings or other time-critical information.
profile_athlete_language_description: What languages do you speak comfortably? You can add multiple languages.
profile_athlete_birthday_description: Your birthday will be used to validate your membership.
profile_athlete_category_description: These are the sports and areas you focus on and are used in searches to better match athletes and coaches.
profile_athlete_sport_tag_description: Add a minimum of three skills. Skills are used to specify who you are as an athlete and makes it easier for coaches to see your competences.
personalized_athlete_url_description: Create a custom URL for your Coachsome page to share across your social and digital channels.
chat_purchased_package_box_desc: Select a package to book a session from
booking_charge_box_service_fee_help: This helps us operate our platform and offer customer support for your orders, so that we can ensure a safe and secure environment for our users.
booking_continue_help_txt_not_charged_ye: You will not be charged yet
booking_message_box_text_area_label:
Write a message to the coach about why and when you would like coaching. 
You are very welcome to include age and skill level...
booking_group_package_person_text: Number of people joining the training
booking_request_btn_help_text:
Your card will not be deducted payment before coach
                        confirms the booking

chat_chat_screen_buy_package_message: {name} bought a package. OID of the package is {key}

register_user_type_title_join_coachsome: How are you going to use Coachsome?

The packages sold, bookings made from packages and
                          payouts to you. “x / x” in booking rows, shows the
                          number of the booking from the package and the total
                          sessions in the package.
balance_earning_table_col_amount: Amount is the price of the packages sold.
balance_earning_table_col_fee: Fee is the coach fee (15%) to Coachsome for running the platform, processing payments, etc.
balance_earning_table_col_income: Income is your earning for this package, after Coachsome fee is deducted.

password_reset_email:
Coachsome

Hello!

You are receiving this email because we received a password reset request for your account.

Reset Password

If you did not request a password reset, no further action is required.

Regards,
Coachsome

Dear :packageBuyerName,

Your :orderId is currently pending and waiting for your coach to accept your request. Coaches normally responds within a few hours. To see the status of your request, please visit your booking page.

Go to booking page

Best Regards,
Team Coachsome

For questions, you can reach out to us at: :coachsomeEmailAddress

base_review_desc_give_a_review: Your review will be shown on {name}'s Coachsome profile.
base_review_title_how_would_you_rate: How many stars would you give {name}?
base_review_placeholder_texarea: Write your review here. Remember to be honest, constructive and that your review is going to be viewed by others.
base_review_list_description: Coachsome is proud to offer the best private sports coaches on the market. All of our coaches are validated by our team to ensure that you will get the best possible service. Hundreds of customers love our coaches, read the reviews below to see why.
base_review_success_title: You have successfully submitted your review!
coach_review_description_total_review_re: Your total reviews received and your overall review score on Coachsome.
coach_review_section_description_request: Request a review from one you would like to give you a review. You can request from anyone through email and ask them to leave a review for your profile. This will help to verify your profile and get you more bookings.
coach_review_request_dialog_desc: Invite people to give you a review by typing in their email addresses. You can invite multiple people at the same time.
email_base_review_request:
:requesterName requested a review on Coachsome

Hi!

:requesterName has requested you to leave a reivew on Coachsome. By giving a review, you can help :requesterName create credibility.


1 Increase coaches sales on the platform

2 Provide credibility for new customers

3 Gather trust

4 Help coaches get started

5 ... and much more!


Write a review
